body: Thanks for your information, @jdduke . I think I got the point.  I directly use the the dimensions pointer transfer into addOperand() without copying the dimension values in our NNAPI implementation. That's why I had a segfault. You are correct! Thank you for your help.  I will close the request, since it is not necessary to have any changes.
